data.name: Malamar

abilities.name: Psychic Recharge
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Psychic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

data.flavorText: It lures prey close with hypnotic motions, then wraps its tentacles around it before finishing it off with digestive fluids.

data.name: Malamar

attacks.name: Eerie Wave
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Random Peck
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 more damage for each heads.

data.flavorText: Gazing at its luminescent spots will quickly induce a hypnotic state, putting the observer under Malamar's control.

data.name: Malamar

attacks.name: Entangling Control
attacks.text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with his or her Active Pokémon. The new Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Trash Tentacle
attacks.text: Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

data.flavorText: It lures prey close with hypnotic motions, then wraps its tentacles around it before finishing it off with digestive fluids.

data.name: Malamar

abilities.name: Psychic Recharge
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Psychic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

data.flavorText: It lures prey close with hypnotic motions, then wraps its tentacles around it before finishing it off with digestive fluids.

data.name: Malamar-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Hyper Hypnosis
abilities.text: When you attach an Energy from your hand to this Pokémon, you may use this Ability. Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: MAXamar
attacks.text: Flip a coin for each Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 60 damage times the number of heads.

data.name: Malamar

ancientTrait.name: θ Stop
ancientTrait.text: Prevent all effects of your opponent's Pokémon's Abilities done to this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Contrary
abilities.text: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, whenever your opponent flips a coin during his or her turn, treat it as tails.

attacks.name: Conform
attacks.text: If you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

data.flavorText: It lures its prey close with hypnotic motions, then wraps its tentacles around it before finishing it off with digestive fluids.

data.name: Malamar

attacks.name: Mental Trash
attacks.text: Your opponent flips 4 coins. For each tails, he or she discards a card from his or her hand.

attacks.name: Distortion Beam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep. If tails, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

data.flavorText: It wields the most compelling hypnotic powers of any Pokémon, and it forces others to do whatever it wants.

data.name: Malamar

attacks.name: Mental Panic
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Puncture
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

data.flavorText: It wields the most compelling hypnotic powers of any Pokémon, and it forces others to do whatever it wants.

data.name: Malamar

attacks.name: Psybeam
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Energy Slosh
attacks.text: You may move all Energy attached to this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

data.flavorText: It wields the most compelling hypnotic powers of any Pokémon, and it forces others to do whatever it wants.

data.name: Malamar

abilities.name: Psychic Recharge
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Psychic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

data.flavorText: It lures prey close with hypnotic motions, then wraps its tentacles around it before finishing it off with digestive fluids.

data.name: Malamar V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Drag Off
attacks.text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with their Active Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to the new Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Brain Shake
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

data.name: Malamar VMAX
rules: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Max Jammer
attacks.text: Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose a card you find there and put it on the bottom of their deck.

data.name: Malamar-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Hyper Hypnosis
abilities.text: When you attach an Energy from your hand to this Pokémon, you may use this Ability. Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: MAXamar
attacks.text: Flip a coin for each Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 60 damage times the number of heads.

data.name: Malamar

attacks.name: Hypnotic Reign
attacks.text: Your opponent reveals their hand. You may discard a Pokémon you find there and use one of that Pokémon's non-GX attacks as this attack.

attacks.name: Dark Pressure
attacks.text: Discard the top card of your opponent's deck.

data.flavorText: When it comes to strong hypnosis, there's an endless number of people who utilize Malamar for their nefarious deeds.

data.name: Malamar V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Drag Off
attacks.text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with their Active Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to the new Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Brain Shake
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

data.name: Malamar VMAX
rules: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Max Jammer
attacks.text: Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose a card you find there and put it on the bottom of their deck.

data.name: Malamar

attacks.name: Rapid Strike Tentacles
attacks.text: Reveal any number of Rapid Strike cards from your hand. This attack does 40 damage for each card you revealed in this way. Then, shuffle those cards into your deck.

data.flavorText: It's said that Malamar's hypnotic powers played a role in certain history-changing events.

data.name: Malamar

attacks.name: Synchro Kinesis
attacks.text: Each player reveals their hand. If a card in your opponent's hand has the same name as a card in your hand, this attack does 90 more damage.

data.flavorText: Gazing at its luminescent spots will quickly induce a hypnotic state, putting the observer under Malamar's control.

data.name: Malamar

attacks.name: Rapid Strike Tentacles
attacks.text: Reveal any number of Rapid Strike cards from your hand. This attack does 40 damage for each card you revealed in this way. Then, shuffle those cards into your deck.

data.flavorText: It's said that Malamar's hypnotic powers played a role in certain history-changing events.

data.name: Malamar

abilities.name: Psychic Insight
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may look at the top card of your opponent's deck. If you do, look at the top card of your deck.

attacks.name: Hypnotic Ray
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

data.flavorText: It's said that Malamar's hypnotic powers played a role in certain history-changing events.

attacks.name: Colluding Tentacles
attacks.text: Switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon to the Active Spot. If you do, this attack does 120 damage to the new Active Pokémon. If you didn't play Xerosic's Machinations from your hand during this turn, this attack does nothing.
